reviews.review_msg: disregard the last comment. great class! the guy is definitely on the ball and is definitely one of the smarter profs in the faculty. highly approachable and gives specific feedback instead of wacking around the bush. definitely worth takin'

Not a bad prof, out of touch from what she teaches and tests on.  The text was high school level and she used a lot of simple case studies; however, on the exam and essay she expected higher level than what she had been teaching. The whole class received a C, she decided to inform us we all did bad  on the essay moments before we started our final.
